title: Identity - Tony Guntrip.epub
description: A serial killer preys within the city - and the only comfort is that John Tilley, the closest thing a modern city can have to an iconic detective, is working the case. His method is entirely evidence-based, and has never failed him. Working with Tilley is Jane Anderson, a few weeks with the team having replaced a long-serving but terminally-ill colleague. Anderson struggles with Tilley's aloofness and his need to remain detached from his team. She also begins to resent his attitude both to her and the world in general. As the killer continues to wreak havoc across the city, and the victims diversify into an impossibly random pattern, the evidence - the innate truth of which Tilley's career and reputation have been built - accumulates and focuses attention on one individual
